sentences: Informal consultations on finance took place in the morning and afternoon.

In the morning, parties proposed text relating to: strengthening or operationalizing the financial mechanism; the establishment of funds; the operating entity of the financial mechanism; and the governance structure of the operating entity.
Parties also proposed textual formulations that consolidate options on a facilitative platform and matching function.
In the afternoon, discussions focused on reordered text on options for the generation of funds.
